profile:
Fresh Air Abatement is a company that specializes in asbestos, lead abatement removal projects and everything in between. Our team has the tools and experience necessary to have your project! We service the areas of Toronto & GTA, including but not limited to Brampton, Mississauga, Vaughan, downtown Toronto, Collington, and also Pickering. 


Call us for a free quote today at (905) 781-3063! 


Note: Testing is incorporated in our fees, which means we waive the testing fees!
products: We specialize in mold & asbestos removal, including testing of the levels. Moreover, we also do the demolition and the rebuild and clean up.
services: We specialize in the restoration and abatement services in these areas:  Mold & Asbestos removal, testing the material for asbestos levels, water damage control, fire & smoke damage, lead paint removal as well as any hazardous material removal. To add, we do the demolition and rebuild.  We are able to work on high rises inside and out, as well as confined spaces.
name: Fresh Air Abatement Company
